body_html:
Thanks @alexminnaar ! This solution worked for me. There were a few more hacks required.

For those trying please also note that you need to change all tf.histogram_summary and tf.scalar_summary to tf.summary.histogram and tf.summary.scalar, to successfully load and export the model as indicated in the post pointed by @alexminnaar above

body:
Thanks @alexminnaar ! This solution worked for me. There were a few more hacks required.

For those trying please also note that you need to change all tf.histogram_summary and tf.scalar_summary to tf.summary.histogram and tf.summary.scalar, to successfully load and export the model as indicated in the post pointed by @alexminnaar above
